flawed_nl_solution:
One student got 36 questions right because 40 - 3 = <<40-3=36>>36
This student's proportion right is 0.9 because 36 / 40 = <<36/40=0.9>>0.9
This student got a 90% because 0.9 x 100 = <<0.9*100=90>>90
The student got got a 95% got 38 right because 40 x 0.95 = <<40*0.95=38>>38
Hannah needs to get 39 questions right because 38 + 1 = <<38+1=39>>39
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 37, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
